about_the_game:
Finding Extreme Mode a bit too hard? Maybe you don't have much time on your hands?
Then this is for you!
Purchase this DLC to unlock all achievements!

Go to the Title Screen after purchasing this DLC.
If the game has already been launched, you will need to quit once.

Please note that this DLC can be purchased even if you have
already unlocked some achievements.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains scenes of blood and violence.
Care has been taken with the depiction of grotesque imagery to avoid the representation of amputated limbs, etc.
